C:The recommended automation solution to create a standard set of related Project Milestones when a Project record is created is a Before-save autolaunched flow.

The Before-save autolaunched flow is a flow that runs in the system context and is triggered before a record is saved to the database. In this case, the flow can create a standard set of related Project Milestones and associate them with the parent Project record before the record is saved. This ensures that all related Project Milestones are created and associated with the Project record at the time of creation.

Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) wants to start using Salesforce for its HR recruiting process. NTO needs to ensure that every application is linked to both a job posting and an applicant. Applicants can apply for more than one job posting, and each job posting can have more than one applicant.

How should an administrator configure the objects?

choices.A: Create Applicants as a junction object with a master-detail relationship to Job Postings and a lookup relationship to Job Applications.
choices.B: Configure Job Applications as a junction object with master-detail relationships to both Applicants and Job Postings.
choices.D: Make Job Applications as a junction object with a master-detail relationship to Applicants and a lookup relationship to Job Postings.
choices.C: Add Applicants as a junction object with master-detail relationships to both Job Postings and Job Applications.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The answer is B
https://www.salesforceben.com/what-is-a-junction-object-in-salesforce/

D. Make Job Applications as a junction object with a master-detail relationship to Applicants and a lookup relationship to Job Postings.

This configuration will allow for each job application to be linked to both an applicant and a job posting, while also allowing for multiple applications per job posting and multiple job postings per applicant. The master-detail relationship between Job Applications and Applicants will ensure that an application can't exist without an applicant, and the lookup relationship between Job Applications and Job Postings will allow for multiple applications to be linked to a single job posting.
